"A.P.241/4/22/18:30": "Oh, <%me>. Perfect timing as usual."
"Since this is the final battle, I'm sending a request for Earth Guide's assistance... Good, we're connected."
"Huh, there's no video...?"
"...That's weird. Hey, Sir Ardem! Ardem, can you hear me?"
"I can hear you, Enga. There's no issue with transmitting voice. Video communication seems to be down though."
"...Perhaps this is due to the influence of Phantoms spreading across the moon."
"I see you've noticed the changes in the moon as well. You could have contacted us and let us know."
"Sorry. We were in the middle of making various preparations as well."
"Judging by the timing of your call... I already know what you plan to do. Preperations on our side are complete."
"Earth Guide will back you up with all of our strength. I'll personally come as well, of course."
"We fight for the people of Earth, that they may keep moving forward. This is a fight we must win, no matter what."
"...However, the strength of those on Earth is still not enough to overcome this hurdle."
"Therefore, those in ARKS. <%me>."
"Please lend us your assistance in this battle."
"And Enga... Your body, your strength... please take care of them. Be careful... and let's meet again someday."
"...To you as well."

"アースガイドのみなさんも、協力体制を
整えてる、とのことですね。
杞憂でしたね、エンガさん。"

"<%me>を呼んで……
ヒツギを呼ばなかった……
……こっちが見えてた？\u3000まさかな。"
"エンガさん？"

"……ああ、なんでもねーよ。
それよりシエラさん、こっちの準備ってのは
いつごろ終わりそうなんだ？"
"ふふふ……よくぞ聞いてくれました！"

"突入地点の算出および、敵勢力図の計測！
それにあわせた突入計画の立案と承認！"

"もろもろのバックアッププラン含めて
一通りの承認、いただきましたー！"

"私に出来ることは、ここまで。
なのであとは……みなさんに、お任せです。"

"<%me>さん……
いつもいつもいつもいつも、貴方ばかり
頼ってしまって、申し訳ありません。"
"どうか、よろしくお願いします。"
